topic.title: Import Data from MS Excel (2007 or Newer)

body.p: To import spreadsheet data from Excel 2007 or newer (.xlsx), needs additional libraries from the release 3.17 of the Apache POI project.

To add this support, follow this procedure:
Go to Help Install new add-ons to open an add-on selection dialog box.
Enter or paste https://www.oxygenxml.com/InstData/Addons/default/updateSite.xml in the Show add-ons from field or select it from the drop-down menu.
Select Excel XLSX libraries v3.17 plugin and click Next.
Restart the application.
Result: You can now use the Import wizard to import data from Excel 2007 or newer.

section.title: Alternate Method to Manually Add the Libraries
section.p:
To manually add the libraries, follow these steps:
Download version 3.17 of the Apache POI project from . The specific ZIP file that you need is: poi-bin-3.17-20170915.zip.
Unpack poi-bin-3.17-20170915.zip.
In the /lib directory, create a directory named endorsed (/lib/endorsed).
Copy the following .jar files into the new endorsed directoryplugin.xml file of the Eclipse plugin (if you installed the plugin via the Eclipse update site, you will find it in the eclipse/plugins/com.oxygenxml... folder, and if you installed it via the dropins ZIP distribution, it is located in the eclipse/dropins/plugins/com.oxygenxml... folder):
curvesapi-1.04.jar
poi-ooxml-3.17.jar
poi-ooxml-schemas-3.17.jar
xmlbeans-2.6.0.jar The .jar files can be found in either the root folder where you unpacked the archive, or in the ooxml-lib subfolder.
Result: You can now use the Import wizard to import data from Excel 2007 or newer.
